ComicInfo.Title: Madness Is All In the Mind!
ComicInfo.Summary: Madness Is All In the Mind!: The Wraith defeats Iron Man and Spider-Man. Jean's father appears, telling her that the Wraith is her brother.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 15:48:22. [Issue ID 30218]
